summary:
This mod brings any hunter his true hunters focus.
Trigger your mind and focus on the signs accosiated 
with your hunting instincts. Use your skills to tactically 
set course with spells, weapons and armor that apply to hunters only.
descriptionHtml:
[h1]NEWS FLASH: I\'ll be on a skieing trip from February 15th till February 24th![/h1]

[b]The \\\"Mind\\\" series currently include:[/b]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=118250193]A Blood Benders Mind[/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=123027495]A Keen Markmans Mind[/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=124113739]A Dark Alchemists Mind[/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=124781214]A True Hunters Mind[/url]


This mod brings any hunter his true hunters focus.
Trigger your mind and focus on the signs accosiated 
with your hunting instincts. Use your skills to tactically 
set course with spells, weapons and armor that apply to hunters only.

All items are found at \\\"Dragontooth Crater\\\"
(Console: coc dragonlair01exterior02)

[b]BASE SPELLS:[/b]
[b]Mindstate: Sign of Craft[/b]
Put your mind in to full focus and perform all kinds of crafting on the go.
(Custom scripted menu that lets you choose to Craft, Temper and/or Enchant items)

[b]Summon: A True Hunters Ghost[/b]
Summons a hunters spirit that will fight along your side for 2 minutes.

[b]WEAPONS:[/b]
[b]Staff of the Hunters Ghost[/b]
A long lost staff that Summons a hunters spirit that will fight along your side for 2 minutes.

[b]ARMOR:[/b]
[b]True Sneaking Hunting Armor:[/b]
A full armor set that makes you nearly invisible. If the player is wearing the full set he/she
will recieve a huge sneaking bonus that makes you almost unnoticeable. Be weary though, once
seen they will still be able to track you down.
* This set of armor will also be craftable once crafting lvl 100 is reached.

[b]COMES WITH:[/b]
[b]Custom scripts[/b]
[b]Custom textures[/b]

[b]New staff[/b]
[b]New spelltomes[/b]
[b]New set of armor[/b]

[b]Temper options[/b]
[b]Crafting options[/b]
[b]Enchant options[/b]

~---~---~---~---~---~

[b]Skype:[/b] Dyramisty
[b]Facebook:[/b] [url=http://www.facebook.com/ddeheer]Dylan de Heer[/url]

[b]Skyrim Nexus:[/b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1384870]Dyramisty[/url]

~---~---~---~---~---~

[b]CHANGELOG:[/b] 
V1.0:
* Release
author: Dyramisty
